name: Orbital Decay (Yann Patoux)
description:
Orbital Decay is a multiplayer FPS/Dogfight game made with Unity.

Two teams are fighting to protect their capitol ship and destroy the enemy's capitol ship. First team to 0 point lose the game.

To play you need one guy to create the game and others to join with IP Address of the host.

Host Port : 7777

Credits :

Programmers Artists Noah BURNEL Antoine BERNOUD Valentin BRUN Tim BERNOUD Basile MILLEREUX Romain ESPINOSA Philippe NAUD Alexandre LAGUIGNER Yann PATOUX Quentin NEDELEC
